plot: While Mary and Alice continue their sisterly bonding, Ryan, Luke, and Sophie are willing to do almost anything to stop them; Renee is forced to revisit her heartbreaking past.

Renee, Ryan, and Sophie search for Pam's entombed body. Meanwhile, Marquis throws a party and Ryan, Luke, and Mary all attend. Ryan finds a cure for Mary but hesitates to use it, not knowing what effect it will have on her own. And Sophie discovers what Renee has been hiding from everyone.—Gislef
